subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Jack McClinton scored all of his 20 points in the game’s first 26.5 minutes and James Dews had 7 of his 9 in a 9-0 second-half run as Miami beat St. John’s, 70-56, on Saturday at Madison Square Garden.
snippet: Jack McClinton scored all of his 20 points in the game’s first 26.5 minutes and James Dews had 7 of his 9 in a 9-0 second-half run as Miami beat St. John’s, 70-56, on Saturday at Madison Square Garden.
